dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aggressively assert their position and may become confrontational when disagreeing.
Your FarTwin will work to find common ground and collaborate with others to resolve disputes.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tend to avoid taking risks and may become anxious or hesitant when faced with uncertainty.
Your FarTwin will be open to trying new things and taking calculated risks to achieve their goals.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving money and living below their means.
Your FarTwin will focus on enjoying themselves and spending money on experiences and luxuries.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach education and personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer structured learning environments and traditional teaching methods.
Your FarTwin will be self-motivated and prefer to learn independently through online resources and hands-on experience.

dimensions.label: Social Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tend to prefer one-on-one interactions and may feel drained by large social gatherings.
Your FarTwin will be comfortable in social situations and enjoy meeting new people.

dimensions.label: Organizational Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time and tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will struggle to stay on top of their tasks and may feel overwhelmed by their workload.
Your FarTwin will be methodical and structured in their approach, using tools and systems to stay organized.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or emotions.
Your FarTwin will approach decision-making in a logical and methodical way, weighing options and considering multiple perspectives.
